content:
1. Edit the Dokuwiki
  2. From time to time Pavel will convert it to Antora, and the last conversion is not the last one.
  3. The antora source should not be maintained in any other way.
  4. Dave will determine when we should stop editing in Dokuwiki.

See https://opencpn.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/437623-User-Manual---Editors/topic/Shortcuts.20page.20organization/near/472688964
